p: At present, there are several commercially available antivirals to treat skin lesions caused by HSV-1 and HSV-2. However, such drugs are somewhat ineffective for this type of clinical manifestation, as they only shorten the recovery time of the lesions in 1â€“2 days in most cases ( Evans et al., 2000; Leflore et al., 2000). For some individuals, the effectiveness of these treatments may be imperceptible [meta-analysis: Chen et al. (2016)].
